# Welcome!
<img src= "https://wallpapercave.com/wp/wp2381382.jpg" width="950" height="500" /> 

### The Basics
What the animals need

Cows  | Chickens |Ducks 
------|----------|--------
Grass | Bugs     | Water Bath
Water | Coop     | Bugs 
Snacks| Feed     |  Snuggles
Pets  | Water    | Food

*All* animals need snuggles to have a happy life. It is important to keep them **happy** and __healthy--.

* Important Notes
  + Make sure they have food and water
  + Have companions for them
  + Be Nice to them
  
1. Build them a home
2. Decorate it
3. Put some food and water in there
